attributes.additional_details:
I think its time to re-nationalise the utility companies and stop so much moneys going out of this country.
All our high profit making companies have been sold
I do not now of any other country in europe that has sold-off all its utility's, So I believe this must come up for a debate as the the prices are going through the roof.
British Gas has just been find but money doesn't go back to its customer in steed it puts up its prices.
Its about time are MPs stood up use.
